description: Creates a farm to allow space for queues and fleets. Farms are the space where the components of your renders gather and are pieced together in the cloud. Farms contain budgets and allow you to enforce permissions. Deadline Cloud farms are a useful container for large projects.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: The unique token which the server uses to recognize retries of the same request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: displayName
parameters.description: The display name of the farm.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The tags to add to your farm. Each tag consists of a tag key and a tag value. Tag keys and values are both required, but tag values can be empty strings. (string) --- (string) ---
